benchmark_details.name: AxiOM (Anxiety Oriented Meme classification)
benchmark_details.overview: We propose a novel dataset, AxiOM, derived from the GAD anxiety questionnaire, which categorizes memes into six fine-grained anxiety symptoms.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To understand and classify the mental health symptoms expressed in memes.

data.source: Various online sources including Reddit and Instagram, with memes categorized based on the GAD questionnaire.
data.annotation: Annotated by healthcare professionals based on the GAD questionnaire.

methodology.calculation: Weighted-F1 score calculated to evaluate performance across multiple symptoms.
methodology.interpretation: Higher F1 scores indicate better classification performance.
methodology.baseline_results: M3H achieves improvements of 4.94% on Macro-F1 and 4.20% on Weighted-F1 compared to baseline models.
methodology.validation: Empirical validation against six competitive baselines.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: All personally identifiable information (PII) is thoroughly anonymized to protect user privacy.
